title: South America the series. -Volume 3
creator_credit: Wayne Mitchell, Phoenix Films and BFA Films and Video
brief_description: Part three of a series of five on South America covers the country of Brazil. Most people think of coffee when they hear the word Brazil, but South America’s largest nation is also becoming one of the leading industrially developed countries on the continent. Volume three also covers the importance and influence of Portuguese heritage over the country.
